speaker: Chorus
text_entry: SCENE I. France. Before Harfleur.

speaker: Chorus
text_entry: Alarum. Enter KING HENRY, EXETER, BEDFORD, GLOUCESTER, and Soldiers, with scaling-ladders

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Once more unto the breach, dear friends, once more;

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Or close the wall up with our English dead.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: In peace there's nothing so becomes a man

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: As modest stillness and humility:

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: But when the blast of war blows in our ears,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Then imitate the action of the tiger;

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Stiffen the sinews, summon up the blood,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Disguise fair nature with hard-favour'd rage;

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Then lend the eye a terrible aspect;

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Let pry through the portage of the head

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Like the brass cannon; let the brow o'erwhelm it

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: As fearfully as doth a galled rock

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: O'erhang and jutty his confounded base,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Swill'd with the wild and wasteful ocean.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Now set the teeth and stretch the nostril wide,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Hold hard the breath and bend up every spirit

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: To his full height. On, on, you noblest English.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Whose blood is fet from fathers of war-proof!

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Fathers that, like so many Alexanders,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Have in these parts from morn till even fought

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: And sheathed their swords for lack of argument:

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Dishonour not your mothers; now attest

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: That those whom you call'd fathers did beget you.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Be copy now to men of grosser blood,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: And teach them how to war. And you, good yeoman,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Whose limbs were made in England, show us here

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: The mettle of your pasture; let us swear

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: That you are worth your breeding; which I doubt not;

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: For there is none of you so mean and base,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: That hath not noble lustre in your eyes.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: I see you stand like greyhounds in the slips,

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Straining upon the start. The game's afoot:

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Follow your spirit, and upon this charge

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Cry 'God for Harry, England, and Saint George!'

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Exeunt. Alarum, and chambers go off
